info.title: Data Gateway
info.description:
Build the data flow you need—for customer onboarding, background verifications, and collecting electronic signatures.

[See on Setu docs](https://docs.setu.co/data)

We currently support the following data blocks:

**Aadhaar based e-Sign**
Collect legally binding digital signatures. Upload a document and create a signature request for one or more signers.


**Aadhaar Offline KYC**
Onboard with Aadhaar XML on your platform, in compliance with UIDAI & RBI guidelines. Simply create a request and share the request URL with your customers.


**PAN Verification**
Check validity and name of PAN holder, with a simple and straightforward PAN verification API.


**Bank Account Verification**
Confirm the validity of an account from the account holder’s bank, with penny-drop done in real-time.

text/plain.example:
{
  "aadhaar": {
    "address": {
      "careOf": "S/O: Mohan",
      "country": "India",
      "district": "Bangalore",
      "house": "# 90 1 Cross",
      "landmark": "Near PO",
      "locality": "M.G. Road",
      "pin": "560072",
      "postOffice": "M.G Road",
      "state": "Karnataka",
      "street": "M.G.Road 1st Main Road",
      "subDistrict": "Bangalore North",
      "vtc": "Bangalore North"
    },
    "dateOfBirth": "22-01-1980",
    "email": "550fa5fd91eee3f29f6361a8c89aa9713d4d38811d1a5",
    "gender": "M",
    "generatedAt": "20210419145604802",
    "maskedNumber": "xxxx-xxxx-8112",
    "name": "Aditya Mohan",
    "phone": "09c91184c1d610282d661dd63d257e3b44446853fb1388c9d5b",
    "photo": "/9j/4AAQSkZJRgABAgAAAQABAAD/2wBDAAgGBgcGBQgHBwcJCQgKD==",
    "verified": {
      "email": false,
      "phone": false,
      "signature": true

    "xml": {

      "validUntil": 12345678
    }
  },

}
